item.description: Terminology Node: The deployment target - this is what configured, has chef-client or chef-solo installed Chef Client: a command line tool that configures servers. Chef Server: This is where all your code resides. It also contains all the information about nodes. N.B = combined with a Node when using Chef-Solo. Recipes - a single file of Ruby code that contains commands to run on a node. Resources - a nodeâ€™s resources include files, directories, users and services.
